comments: Best English teacher ever! Very helpful and clear at explaining things!
He uses neat media sources from the Internet. He\'s young and very easy to get along with. His assignments are all connected to the real world which makes his class great. Go get \'im, ladies!
This teacher is really cool and knows how to relate to his students really well. He isn\'t bad to look at either, ladies!
awesome teacher. easy to talk to. young and relates well to students
Not the worst. Not the best. Fairly easy-going as long as you do the work and try.
